article:
In America,where labor costs are so high, do-it-yourself is a way of life.Many people  _  their own car,build their own garages,even rebuild their own  houses  .Soon they may also be writing their own books.In Hollywood there is a company  _  publishes  Children's books  _  the help of computers.Although other book  _  also publish that way,this particular company is very  _  .It "personalizes" the book by having the computer make the reader the leading character in the story.Here is  is named  they do it.Let us say your child  _  Jenny.She lives on Oak Drive in St. Louis,has a dog named Spot,a cat named Tabby,and three playmates  _  names are Betty,Sandy ,and Jody.The computer uses this  _  to fill out a story that has  _  been prepared and illustrated .The story is then printed  with standard equipment  receives  such a book might say,"This book is about me";the company therefore calls  _  the Me-book Publishing Company".
Children like the Me-books because they like to see their own names in print and  _  of their friends and their pets.  _  more important ,"personalization" has been  found  to be important tool  in  _  enthusiasm  for reading.So Me-books are helping  a child  to learn how to read,  _  appealing to  that natural desire to see his own name in print.
